string.value: This device is not yet authorized for Adobe DRM content.
This device is authorized for reading Adobe DRM content.
This device is authorized for reading and purchasing Adobe DRM content.

Do you want to DELETE all content, restore all factory settings, and clear the DRM authorization state?
Yes - Press the "OPTIONS" button No - Press the "HOME" button
The Reader is unable to charge as no power supply is being detected. Please check that the charger is plugged in and switched on or that the USB cable is correctly connected.
The Reader is currently experiencing extreme temperatures and is unable to charge. Please return the Reader to normal room temperature and retry.
The rechargeable battery requires service. Please contact customer support.

Your Reader needs to be reset. To do this, insert a pin into the Reset hole and then slide and release the power switch. If you continue to see this message on-screen, please contact customer support.
continue to see this message on-screen, please contact customer support.
Choose your preferred language and select "OK". Note: The device settings can be changed from the "Settings" menu at a later time.
Are you sure you want to restore the default settings?
Are you sure you want to format the internal memory? Warning: All content and notes will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to format the Memory Stick™ card? Warning: All content and notes will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to format the SD card? Warning: All content and notes will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to delete this book?
Unable to delete book. Tap "OK" to return to the book list.
Are you sure you want to clear the keyboard history?
Are you sure you want to completely power off (shutdown) the device?
Tap "Yes" to start the touch screen calibration.
This setting is not available in demo mode.
This feature is not available in demo mode.
Using the stylus, tap on the center of the target.
Calibration error detected. Please restart calibration process.
Choose your preferred default dictionary and select "OK". Note: The device settings can be changed from the "Settings" menu at a later time.
Do not remove the Memory Stick™ card.
Do not remove the SD card.
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark?
Note: This page contains a bookmark in more than one text size. All bookmarks on this page will be removed if you proceed.
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark?
Note: This page contains a bookmark with a note in more than one text size. All bookmarks and notes on this page will be removed if you proceed.
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark and associated note?
Are you sure you want to delete the highlight and associated note?
Do you want to continue searching from the end of the content?
Do you want to continue searching from the beginning of the content?
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark and associated note?
Are you sure you want to delete the highlight and associated note?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
Are you sure you want to delete?
Are you sure you want to delete this drawing?
Are you sure you want to delete this memo?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
No entry found. Press XXBUTTONXX to enter a word manually or Press "OPTIONS" to select another dictionary.
No entry found. Please check the entered word.
Are you sure you want to delete this issue?
Unable to delete issue. Tap "OK" to return to the issue list.
Choose where to create a collection:
Are you sure you want to delete the selected item(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected item(s) including pictures chosen for display on the standby screen?
This book is protected. Are you sure you want to delete this book?
Are you sure you want to delete this protected issue?
This memo is protected. Are you sure you want to delete this memo?
This drawing is protected. Are you sure you want to delete this drawing?
How many issues do you want to keep from this subscription on your Reader?
Note: Protected issues are not included in this count.
Are you sure you want to delete the extra issue(s) now?
This feature is disabled because the "Create/Edit Notes" toolbar is shown. Please close this toolbar to enable this feature.
This feature is disabled because you are in "2 Page View". Please change to "1 Page View" to enable this feature.
This feature is disabled because you are in "2 Page View" and using the "Create/Edit Notes" tool bar. Please change to "1 Page View" and close the tool bar to enable this feature.
No dictionary has been selected. Please go to the "Settings" tab and select your dictionary.
"Wireless Standby" puts the wireless feature in "Standby" mode when the network is idle for ten minutes. Turn "On" to increase battery life and turn "Off" to improve connection times.
This feature is not available while downloading content. Please select this again after the download is finished.
The Reader Store cannot be accessed because the "WIRELESS" switch is turned off. Please turn it on and try again.
The Reader Store cannot be accessed because the network is not connected. Please try again after connecting.
The Reader Store cannot be accessed because the "Date and Time" setting or "Time Zone" setting is incorrect. Please correct them from the "Settings" tab and try again.
Your SIM card is not recognized. Please shut down your Reader, re-insert your SIM card and turn your Reader back on. If this problem continues, please contact Sony Customer Support.
This SIM card is locked by PIN code or PUK code. Please unlock with another product and try again, or contact Sony Customer Support.
The Reader was unable to download the content because the "WIRELESS" switch is turned off.
Please turn it on and once you are connected to the network, you can start downloading again from your "My Account" page in the Reader Store.
The Reader was unable to download the content because the network is not connected.
Once you are connected to the network, you can start downloading again from your "My Account" page in the Reader Store.
The Reader was unable to connect because the "Date and Time" setting or "Time Zone" setting are incorrect.
Please correct them from the "Settings" tab and once you are connected to the network, you can start downloading again from your "My Account" page in the Reader Store.
The Reader was unable to download the content because there is not enough space in the Internal Memory.

In order to download the new content, you need to delete files from the Internal Memory. Once you have made enough space, you can start downloading again from your "My Account" page in the Reader Store.
The Reader was unable to download the content.
Please try downloading again from your "My Account" page in the Reader Store. (Error Code: XXCODEXX)
An error occurred while accessing the wireless feature. Please shut down your Reader by pressing the "RESET" button on the bottom and turn the Reader back on.
The Reader is connecting to the network and will then start the download.
An error occurred while accessing the wireless feature. Please wait for the wireless status icon in the status bar to display "STBY", then turn the WIRELESS switch off and then turn it back on again.
This Memory Stick™ card may have been damaged. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
This SD card may have been damaged. Please try another SD card.
Due to a Memory Stick™ card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
Due to an SD card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another SD card.
The Memory Stick™ card is read-only and your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
Due to a Memory Stick™ card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
Due to a SD card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another SD card.
The Memory Stick™ card needs to be formatted. Please go to the Settings tab and format the Memory Stick™ card.
The SD card needs to be formatted. Please go to the Settings tab and format the SD card.
This file is corrupted and cannot be opened.
Because the Memory Stick™ card is locked, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please eject the Memory Stick™ card, unlock it and re-insert it.
Because the SD card is locked, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please eject the SD card, unlock it and re-insert it.
There is not enough free space available to save your Reader profile to the device. Please delete one or more files and try again.
The file cannot be opened. The file format is not supported.
The file cannot be played. The file format is not supported.
This Memory Stick™ card is protected. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
The Reader has detected an error with the battery and it can no longer be charged. The Reader will now shut down. Please replace with the new dedicated battery and turn on the "POWER" switch.
If this message still appears after exchanging the battery, please contact Sony Customer Support.
The Reader has detected that the battery has been removed and will now shut down. Please insert the battery and turn on the "POWER" switch.
The book cannot be opened on this device because of DRM issues. If you purchased this book previously, please re-download it from the "My Account" page in the Reader Store.
When set "On", the Reader enters sleep mode after 10 minutes of inactivity and powers off after 2 days of continuous sleep mode.
Select your preferred method to turn pages. The arrow pointing left means that you swipe the touch screen to the left while the arrow pointing right means swiping the touch screen to the right.
Slide duration can be set to up to 60 seconds. The slideshow menu can be found by pressing "OPTIONS" within the Pictures application.
When device lock is set "On", it is required to enter the pass code whenever the Reader is turned on. Be sure to turn off "Device Lock" before connecting to your computer.
You have 0 periodicals on your Reader. Tap the "Store" tab to browse and purchase periodicals.
This drawing has become corrupted and cannot be opened.
Reader is in sleep mode. Slide and release the power switch to wake up.
The "Page Mode" will be restored to "Original".
The "Create/Edit Notes" screen will be closed.
By selecting "On" for "Show picture", selected pictures are displayed in sleep mode. When selecting "On" for "Show message", messages about how to wake up the Reader are displayed.
Select screen rotation direction when "Orientation" is selected in the "OPTIONS" menu.
The specified collection name already exists. Please enter another name.
Are you sure you want to proceed? Actual content will remain undeleted.
Are you sure you want to proceed? Actual content will remain undeleted.
The selected dictionary will be changed From: %CUR_DIC% To: %NEW_DIC%
Applying settings... Please wait a moment.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on the Memory Stick™ card has been reached. Please unselect a picture on the Memory Stick™ card and select this picture again.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on the SD Card has been reached. Please unselect a picture on the SD Card and select this picture again.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on the Internal Memory has been reached. Please unselect a picture on the Internal Memory and select this picture again.
There are no items in this list. Please refer to the User Guide for information on how to add content.
There are no items in this list.
This book is currently set to hide notes. Do you want to display the notes?
No entry found. XXBUTTON1XX for manual search XXBUTTON2XX for search in another dictionary.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the Memory Stick™ card and the SD Card has been reached.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the Memory Stick™ card and the Internal Memory has been reached.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the SD Card and the Internal Memory has been reached.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the Memory Stick™ card, the SD Card and the Internal Memory has been reached.
This content is protected. Unprotect the content before deletion.
There is no content in the storage where the specified collection exists. To add a content, the physical location of both content and collection must be the same.
